mapper.insert: insert into score (id, ctime, empid, ishr, valid, attitude, ability, carid, detail) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ishr,jdbcType=BIT}, #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{ability,jdbcType=REAL}, #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update score set ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, empid = #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ishr = #{ishr,jdbcType=BIT}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attitude = #{attitude,jdbcType=REAL}, ability = #{ability,jdbcType=REAL}, carid = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ctime, empid, ishr, valid, attitude, ability, carid, detail from score
select * from score where carid = #{carid} order by id desc
